content: when i made this blanket i used small amounts of sheepjes colour crafter that was left over when making other projects the pattern is simple and is made of half double crochets worked in a spiral you crochet until the blanket has the size you want or until you simply run out of yarn more information how you can do this is provided in the pattern that is a free download on my linked blog **stitches used in this pattern ** chain slip_stitch double_crochet half treble and picot ❀❀❀ this pattern have been fully tested thank you heike berg for your work and feedback with this pattern ❀❀❀ **join my facebook group ** my facebook group mijo crochet 1 hangout is a social group where you can get support and be inspired by other fellow crocheters welcome ❀❀❀ **mijo crochet patterns ** for more inspiration and patterns visit my linked blog 1 https //www facebook com/groups/mijocrochethangout/
